name: 吳星佑
objective:
光學元件、光學系統、精密機械元件、精密機械系統、光機系統之實務設計與個案研究
Optical elements, optical systems, elements of precision machinery, precision mechanical systems, optical machinery design and case study.
schedule:
本課程主要由業界教師共同合授且預計 6-14 周會需要線上授課。光機系統應用極為廣泛，無論是天文、航太、軍事、醫療、半導體、加速器等高階系統，或講究快速與需價格競爭力之手機、車載、智慧監控等商品，皆仰賴札實的光學與機械知識以確立系統設計滿足需求。本課程內容特別挑選重要的光學與機械做解析外，搭配光學設計軟體、Matlab 模擬以及應用實例以強化重要觀念，並使學生建立相關知解決工程問題與創新能力，並進一步確立興趣與發展方向為主要目標。
This course will be supported by industrial profession and will be taught online for 6-14 weeks. Optical mechanical systems have changed the world and they will continue to do so. The course of optical machinery designed practice aims to be a solution provider for high-end customers in astronomy, aerospace, military, accelerator, and medicine. Also the knowledge can satisfy mass production industries of mobile, automobile, and machine vision. To meet that need, not only does the course introduce core knowledge in optics and mechanics but also practice modeling and case studies to enhance the capability of problem solving and innovation. The subject makes possible to initiating students’ interest in the optical mechanical industry so as to make it as their future careers.
scorePolicy: (1) 課程參與 40% (2) 提問 10%(3) 期中期末考試或報告 (50%)。class attendance (40%). question asking (10%). oral presentation or exam (50%).

1. Malacara: Geometrical and Instrumental Optics, Academic Press 1988
2. Mahajan: Optical Imaging and Aberrations
3. Mouroulis/McDonald: Geometrical Optics and Optical Design Oxford 1997
4. WelfordAberrations of Optical Systems, Hilger 1986
5. Fischer/Tadic-GalebOptical System Design, McGraw Hill 2000
6. Kingslake/Johnson: Fundamentals of optical design
7. Smith: Modern Optical Engineering, Graw Hill 2000
8. Goodman: Introduction to Fourier Optics,Wiley 2005
9. lecture notes from University College London, University of Jena, University of Arizona, Imperial College London
